title: The Prophecy23 - Three Albums Pack  mp3  (2010-2014)
description:
The Prophecy 23 is a German thrash metal band that was founded in 2002.

In 2005 the first demo CD was released No Future for the Dead , which was first produced and distributed by the band itself, but now no longer be available.

After the departure of the founding members Sven Piepenburg and Phileas Hohlweck and the brief introduction by Daniel Black, the band in 2006, driven by style and plays since a mix of Thrash and Death Metal . With the entry of Tobias Scheid on electric bass and vocals in October 2006, the transformation was complete; Songs of the first demo CD will barely be played live.

In 2008 the band released the EP Immortal Attitude , which was published by the sale of self-distributed. This was followed by concerts in Germany and neighboring countries with bands such as The Horsemen of the Apocalypse , Disbelief , Brainstorm , Fleshcrawl , Debauchery , Axxis , Death Before Dishonor , Dark Age , among others.

The Prophecy 23 in early 2010 signed a worldwide record deal with Massacre Records and then published on 16 July 2010, the first official album ... To the Pit.

The two album GREEN MACHINE LASER BEAM debuted at number 18 of the EMP German Top 100 album chart.

Aha, German crossover thrashers The Prophecy23 are back in town, now with album number three in four years time.

Ideal music for parties. Party music it is, but not the kind I would put on to sit back and listen to. No, the sort you have to experience live with quite a few beers.
